properties.entry: SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#seletAllNovel() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelDetail() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A JOIN GENRE_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
SELECT A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CHAP_NUM FROM WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH A JOIN WEB_NOV_INFO B ON (A.WEB_NOV_NUM = B.WEB_NOV_NUM) JOIN WEB_NOV_CHAP_NUM C ON (A.CHAP_NUM = C.CHAP_NUM) WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#searchWebNovelCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM WEB_NOV_CONTENT_DETAIL A WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectPerChap()*/ C.WEB_NOV_NUM , C.CHAP_NUM , C.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , C.WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , WEB_NOV_NUM , CHAP_NUM , WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CHAP_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_CONTENT_DETAIL A ORDER BY A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM ASC ) B WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND B.CHAP_NUM = ? ) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
